=== About ===

<nowiki>[[http://gnomebaker.sourceforge.net/|GnomeBaker]]</nowiki> is a CD/DVD burning software for the GNOME desktop environment. I have started looking at it after a <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=7442|Call for Testers]]</nowiki> by gamehack at the Ubuntu Forums. Since I was also looking for a good CD burner for inclusion in <nowiki>[[http://cdd.debianbrasil.org/|Debian-BR-CDD]]</nowiki>, I decided to test it. And I liked it. And I started to do Debian packages for it.

=== News ===

* 18/10/2005 - Version 0.5.0 packages uploaded to Debian Sid and available as i386 binaries for Sarge.

* 29/08/2005 - Version 0.4.2 package available as i386 binary and source for Debian Sarge. This is a bug fix release, so give it a try if you're experiencing bugs with previous versions.

* 26/07/2005 - Version 0.4 package available as i386 binary for Debian Sarge and Source.

* 22/04/2005 - New CVS snapshot package with BIN+CUE and on-the-fly data CD writing available for Sid and Hoary

* 15/04/2005 - New CVS snapshot package available

* 25/03/2005 - Gnomebaker package accepted into Debian

* 25/03/2005 - Gnomebaker package uploaded to Ubuntu Universe (wainting for approval)

* 06/03/2005 - Hoary binaries available for i386

* 09/02/2005 - Sid binaries available for i386 and ppc
